mapper.select:
SELECT
t
ORDER BY f_id DESC
ORDER BY ${orderField}
SELECT s.* FROM t_ware_stockcheckmain s LEFT JOIN t_ware_stockcheckdetail sd on s.f_id =sd.f_main_id WHERE sd.f_batch_no = #{batchNo} GROUP BY s.f_id
SELECT sc.* FROM t_ware_stockcheckmain sc LEFT JOIN t_ware_stockcheckdetail scd on sc.f_id=scd.f_main_id WHERE sc.f_status = 1 and scd.f_status=0 GROUP BY sc.f_id ORDER BY sc.f_id DESC
SELECT COUNT(1) LEFT JOIN t_ware_stockcheckdetail scd on sc.f_id=scd.f_main_id WHERE sc.f_status = 1 and scd.f_status=0 GROUP BY sc.f_id
